content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed the command "execute_python_file" on the file "Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py" and received "Hello, world!". I then executed the command "append_to_file" on the file "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt" with the text "This is a new line of text." and successfully appended it. I attempted to replace "This is a new line of text." with "This is a modified line of text." at occurrence index 0 and succeeded. I then read the file and received the message "This is a modified line of text." before deleting it successfully. I executed "Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py" and received "Hello, world!". I executed the command "list_files" on the directory "Atlas/executed_code" and received a list of files. I executed the command "execute_shell" with the command line "ls -l" and received a list of files in the directory.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)", "question": "What is Python?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an overview of the Python programming language, including its support for multiple programming paradigms, emphasis on code readability, use of whitespace indentation, comprehensive standard library, and popularity. It also covers its implementations, development process, libraries, frameworks, and notable features, as well as its use cases in scientific computing, web development, and artificial intelligence.\n\nLinks: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']", type='action_result')]
"""
